title: Best of The Herd for May 04, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 04, 2020
description:
The Cowboys sent a pretty clear message to Dak Prescott by signing Andy Dalton

Michael Jordan did not want to get into politics and there is nothing wrong with that

Some companies are run poorly and this Bulls documentary is proof of that

Where Colin was right and wrong over the last week

Guest: Charles Barkley, Hall of Famer & NBA on TNT

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
